attributes.action: Allow Disability Living Allowances to UK Nationals Relocating Within The EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Certain disability allowances such as the Disability Living Allowances are not paid to UK residents who move within the EU.  
A relative of mine has developed a terminal illness called Ménière’s disease which prevents him from walking any great distance without receiving severe dizzy spells and falling over. One cause of a dizzy spell attack is poor lighting levels such as grey cloud, a condition our country is well known for and as such he relocated to a hotter country within the EU to aid his quality of life only to find he is no longer entitled to the benefit.
It is wrong that life served contributors to the welfare system have benefits removed just for relocating out of the UK but within the EU.
